C

changeDirectoryDown(String) - Method in class FileBrowser
Attempts to change to a user specified directory.
changeDirectoryUp() - Method in class FileBrowser
Attempts to change the current directory to the current directory's parent.
changeDrive(String) - Method in class FileBrowser
Attempts to change the drive to the passed in drive name String.
currentDirectory - Variable in class FileBrowser
Keeps track of user's current location.
currentMask - Variable in class FileBrowser
Used to regulate which file structures are visible.

F

FileBrowser - Class in <Unnamed>
FileBrowser allows a user to traverse the directory structure of all the drives available to a computer using a command line interface.
FileBrowser() - Constructor for class FileBrowser
Creates a new instance of FileBrowser, setting the current directory to the user's home directory and the current file mask to '.*' (all files will be displayed).

G

getCurrentDirectory() - Method in class FileBrowser
Returns the current directory.
getDirectories() - Method in class FileBrowser
Returns a sorted Collection containing all subdirectories of the current directory.
getFiles() - Method in class FileBrowser
Returns a sorted Collection of files in the current directory.
getFiles(String) - Method in class FileBrowser
Returns a sorted Collection of files in the current directory with the passed in file type mask.
getRoots() - Method in class FileBrowser
Returns a sorted Collection of the root drives.

I

isDataAvailable() - Static method in class KeyboardReader
Determines whether data from the keyboard is waiting to be read.

K

KeyboardReader - Class in <Unnamed>
KeyboardReader class for use in reading data from the keyboard and use in the remainder of CSCI 131 assignments.
KeyboardReader() - Constructor for class KeyboardReader
 

M

R

Reads an integer value from the keyboard.
